price: ߊ߲ ߘߏ߲߬ ߘߌߣߊ߬ ߓߍ߯ ߕߊ߫ ߞߍߕߊ߫ ߘߊ߲߬ߕߍ߰ ߊ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߟߐ߲ߠߌ߲ ߠߊ߫، ߓߊߏ߬ ߒ߬ ߕߘߍ߬ ߕߍ߫ ߞߐߓߊ߯ ߘߌ߫ ( ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߢߊߞߕߐߡߊ߫ )
arabic: فَلَنَقُصَّنَّ عَلَيۡهِم بِعِلۡمٖۖ وَمَا كُنَّا غَآئِبِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: falanaquṣṣanna ʿalayhim biʿil'min wamā kunnā ghāibīna
